cast.name: 帕德容琶·砂楚 Pachrapa Chaichua
萨兰·萨科恩辛 Saran Sakornsin
阿玛林·西马罗特 Ummarin Simaroj
切斯特·麦克唐纳 Chester McDonald

this_title: คู่เขย คู่ขวัญ
introduction: The story is about two families who asked Gim-Huay, a matchmaker, to pair up their children. Gim-Huay paired Fad, Thanachote's second son, with Nuch, Burana's oldest daughter. At the same time, Parncheewa, Nuch's younger sister, is trying to pair Nuch up with Panukorn. Parncheewa mistook Fad as a pervert, which made her dislike him even more and always try to get in his way. Fad and Parncheewa always argue with each other, eventually they fell in love without even realizing it. On the other side, Da, the youngest of Thanachote's household, really want Nuch as her sister-in-law, so she's always getting in the way of Panukorn. This left Fha, Thanachote's oldest son, to become closer with Nuch, and the both of them fell in love.
foreign_title: คู่เขย คู่ขวัญ
